Headline: #80 Irving Park Temporary Reroute at Irving Park/Keeler
ShortDescription: 80 Irving Park buses are temporarily rerouted via Irving Park, Cicero, Addison, Pulaski and Irving Park due to, street blockage near Irving Park/Keeler.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#80 Irving Park buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Irving Park, Cicero, Addison, Pulaski and Irving Park due to, street blockage near Irving Park/Keeler.

Allow extra travel time.
